ingredients.ingredient: 1 can Del Monte® Sweet Corn Cream Style, No Salt Added
1 can DEL MONTE® Whole Kernel Corn, No Salt Added, well drained

cookingTips: Use both creamed and whole kernel corn for texture variation and sweet corn flavor throughout
Follow muffin mix package directions as base, then fold in corn products gently to avoid overmixing
Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean and the top is golden
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user make easy, delicious sweet cornbread by combining corn muffin mix with both cream-style and whole kernel corn for double corn flavor and appealing texture.
